page.title: 10Life Styles
page.content: {St.Michael's is a Church of England {mixed primary school in Sandhurst}with about 200 pupils aged between 5-11.For the music survey the favourite group was{Wham!}Four children sing in the choir.{Piano}was the instrument played most in the school.In the infants few children belong to clubs. Older children prefer{Brownies/Guides}and {bookclubs. Computers}and watching{T.V. are popular pastimes throughout the school.{Lego (plastic bricks) and soft {toys}are favourite indoor toys.{B.M.X. {(bicycle motor cross) and rollerboots are popular outdoor toys. The favourite sports to watch were {football and dancing}and the favourite sports to play were{swimming and {athletics.}Half the school belong to {Pathfinders, Sunday School or C of E {Churches.}Pathfinders is Bible Studies and playing games.
